Zero JDK

The zero-dependency JDK bootstrap script

What is zero-jdk?

One Tool

Bootstrap your Java project with a single POSIX-compliant script - no JDK required beforehand

One Config File

Use .jdk/config.properties to define your JDK URL. Reproducible, versioned, simple

Supports Gradle and Maven

Automatically sets up the correct wrapper, so you can run `./build init` and get going

Runs on Linux and MacOS

Designed and tested on Unix-like systems. No additional tools or global dependencies required

Get Started Now! â€‹

Paste and run the following in your terminal:

sh
curl -sS https://raw.githubusercontent.com/julien-may/zero-jdk/HEAD/install.sh | sh
